Name: Name Change,  "Dr. Carlo Mannino Place", Bronx.
Title: A Local Law in relation to a corner name, “Dr. Carlo Mannino Place”, Borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New Name				Present Name			Limits

Dr. Carlo Mannino Place		None				the southwest corner
									of the intersection of 
									Schley Avenue and 
      Wilcox Avenue
      
      
      �  2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.


	


	FN:dd
	LS# 938
